Package org.apache.logging.log4j.core.impl

Record Class CoreProperties.Version1Properties

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
org.apache.logging.log4j.core.impl.CoreProperties.Version1Properties
Record Components:
compatibility - If true, the automatic configuration process will scan for version 1.x configuration files.
configuration - The location of a 1.x configuration file.
monitorInterval - The interval in seconds to scan for updates in a 1.x configuration file.
Enclosing class:
CoreProperties
@Log4jProperty(name="v1") public static record CoreProperties.Version1Properties(boolean compatibility, @Nullable String configuration, int monitorInterval) extends Record
Configuration properties for the Log4j 1.x bridge.

This property class is in Log4j Core instead of Log4j 1.2 API, because it is used by the DefaultConfigurationFactory to detect if "log4j.configuration" was set.
